verses.verse: <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5043>son<s%>, be <S%G1743>strong<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3739>things<s%> that thou hast <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G1223>among<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%>, the <S%G5023>same<s%> commit <S%G3908>thou<s%> to <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G3748>who<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G2425>able<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G2087>others<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>. among: or, by
<S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> endure <S%G2553>hardness<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4757>soldier<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

No <S%G3762>man<s%> that <S%G4754>warreth<s%> entangleth <S%G1707>himself<s%> with the <S%G4230>affairs<s%> of this <S%G979>life<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G700>please<s%> him who hath chosen him to be a <S%G4758>soldier<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G118>strive<s%> for masteries, yet is <S%G4737>he<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4737>crowned<s%>, <S%G3362>except<s%> he <S%G118>strive<s%> <S%G3545>lawfully<s%>.

The <S%G1092>husbandman<s%> that <S%G2872>laboureth<s%> must <S%G1163>be<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3335>partaker<s%> of the <S%G2590>fruits<s%>. that: or, labouring first, must be partaker of the fruits

<S%G3539>Consider<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%>; <S%G1063>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G4907>understanding<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>.

<S%G3421>Remember<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> was <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%>:

<S%G1722>Wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> I suffer <S%G2553>trouble<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> an evil <S%G2557>doer<s%>, even <S%G3360>unto<s%> <S%G1199>bonds<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1210>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%>.

<S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> I <S%G5278>endure<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1588>for<s%> the <S%G1588>elect's<s%> <S%G1223>sakes<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G5177>may<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5177>obtain<s%> the <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>.
It is a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%>: <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> we be dead <S%G4880>with<s%> him, we <S%G4800>shall<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> live <S%G4800>with<s%> him:

<S%G1487>If<s%> we <S%G5278>suffer<s%>, we <S%G4821>shall<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> reign <S%G4821>with<s%> him: <S%G1487>if<s%> we <S%G720>deny<s%> him, he <S%G2548>also<s%> will <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>:
<S%G1487>If<s%> we believe <S%G569>not<s%>, yet <S%G1565>he<s%> <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%>: he <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>.

Of these <S%G5023>things<s%> put them in <S%G5279>remembrance<s%>, <S%G1263>charging<s%> them <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> that they <S%G3054>strive<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> about <S%G3054>words<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G5539>profit<s%>, but <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G2692>subverting<s%> of the <S%G191>hearers<s%>.

<S%G4704>Study<s%> to <S%G3936>shew<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G1384>approved<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%>, a <S%G2040>workman<s%> that needeth not to be <S%G422>ashamed<s%>, rightly <S%G3718>dividing<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G225>truth<s%>.
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4026>shun<s%> <S%G952>profane<s%> and vain <S%G2757>babblings<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> they will <S%G4298>increase<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> will <S%G2192>eat<s%> <S%G3542><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> doth a <S%G1044>canker<s%>: of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5211>Hymenaeus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5372>Philetus<s%>; canker: or, gangrene

<S%G3748>Who<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> have <S%G795>erred<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> that the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> is <S%G1096>past<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G396>overthrow<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G5100>some<s%>.

<S%G3305>Nevertheless<s%> the <S%G2310>foundation<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2476>standeth<s%> <S%G4731>sure<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4973>seal<s%>, The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> them that <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G846>his<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G868>Let<s%> every <S%G3956>one<s%> that <S%G3687>nameth<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G868>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G93>iniquity<s%>. sure: or, steady

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> there <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of <S%G5552>gold<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G693>silver<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G3585>wood<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3749>earth<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5092>honour<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G819>dishonour<s%>.

<S%G1437>If<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1571>purge<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%>, he shall <S%G2071>be<s%> a <S%G4632>vessel<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5092>honour<s%>, <S%G37>sanctified<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2173>meet<s%> for the master's <S%G1203>use<s%>, and <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%>.

<S%G5343>Flee<s%> <S%G1161>also<s%> <S%G3512>youthful<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1377>follow<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G26>charity<s%>, <S%G1515>peace<s%>, <S%G3326>with<s%> them that call <S%G1941>on<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3474>foolish<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G521>unlearned<s%> <S%G2214>questions<s%> <S%G3868>avoid<s%>, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they do <S%G1080>gender<s%> <S%G3163>strifes<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G1401>servant<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3164>strive<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2261>gentle<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men, apt to <S%G1317>teach<s%>, <S%G420>patient<s%>, patient: or, forbearing

<S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G4236>meekness<s%> <S%G3811>instructing<s%> those that oppose <S%G475>themselves<s%>; <S%G3379>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3379>peradventure<s%> will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1922>acknowledging<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> that they may recover <S%G366>themselves<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3803>snare<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil<s%>, who are taken <S%G2221>captive<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G1565>his<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%>. recover: Gr. awake taken: Gr. taken alive
